tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I visited Dr.darshini with complaint of high fever and severe body ache. She asked me to check for dengue and it came positive. Day by day for 3 days my condition was getting worse. But she gave me suitable treatment and fluids therapy , this is how she avoided hospitalization. She is very friendly and has good nature. Today I visited her after one week and feeling good just having little weakness , she gave me medication for that. I do recommend her. Extremely happy with her guidance and constant support.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
I visited doctor as a part of my annual health check up.
I was having diabetes since 3 years but was not taking any medications. Doctor found that I'm having uncontrolled sugar levels. My Hba1c is 9.1. So she advised me to take medications and recommended meications for the same and ask me to come after 15 days for follow-up.  She explained medicines in a good way as well as symptoms and side effects related to high sugars. I'm continuing her treatment. I do recommend her.  Thank you doctor for your concern to me.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: To start with doctor's nature and friendliness overall it was very good consultation. She was concerned about my problems. I'm diabetes and bp patient since 7 years and on medication. But suddenly my creatinine levels went up and I visited her for the same. She recommended few investigations and then it showed that my sugar levels are also uncontrolled so as my bp. She suggested good medicines for each n every health issue of mine and few good advices. Today after one month again I visited her and now my creatinine is within normal range and sugars also reduced. I'm very happy with her consultation and now feeling energetic also. I do recommend her who is seeking for good advice and consultation.

To begin with Dr.Darshini is a very professional and friendly doctor. Am extremely happy to have visited her. My usual physician has relocated abroad so I was wondering if the new doc will be reliable or not. But when i visited her nd discussed the health concerns, she was very clear about her suggestions and explained things well. I had a sigh of relief post visiting her. Moreover we can reach her anytime incase we have queries and thats smthng i really like. I would recommend her to any person who wants a reliable and efficient doc.
reply_text: Thank you for the same dear..!!

review:
I felt a lump behind my ear a few days ago and got it checked by the doctor the very next day. I was told it was a thyroid issue and asked to get an FNAC (Fine Needle Aspiration Cytology) test. I was extremely nervous about getting this done and decided to take a second opinion from Dr Darshini.

She listened to me patiently and suspected that this was nothing but an infection. She recommended a blood test and an ultrasound and results showed that my thyroid levels are totally normal and the lump was nothing but a harmless cyst.

Thanks to her I was able to avoid a painful and unnecessary test and I'm so grateful. I'd highly recommend her to anyone looking to get themselves checked up.
reply_text:
Thank you so much..!! 
Get well soon dear..!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: She is a wonderful doctor. I had my own constraints of not taking medicine, but she made sure that alternative was provided to me.  She was so reassuring throughout my whole experience. As far as my results so far are concerned, I am more than satisfied. Would highly recommend her.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: We met Dr. Darshini as a part of my mother's general health check up. In that she found my mother's blood sugar and BP both are not in control.  She gave medications and some advices. Now I'm meeting her after 2 months and my mother's condition also improved a lot since then. Thank you so much doctor.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I have been visiting Dr. Darshini for more than 8 months now. She not only does a thorough investigation of the problem but also helps me understand what is happening. Her way of treatment includes more then medicines. She suggests lifestyle changes and diet as well which is really helpful.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Dr. Darshini is very friendly and she listens to the concerns with utmost attention and care. She suggested many easy methods to control my blood sugar and cholesterol. She is very knowledgeable and the wait time for consultation is very minimal. I would prefer to continue my consultation with her in future as well.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
context: Numbness in fingers and toes,Systemic Hypertension,
review: We consulted doctor for tremors in my hand associated with numbness and tingling sensation. Dr. Darshini is very friendly to us and explained causes very well. She recommended few tests and also she found that I'm developing hypertension too. She started medication for the same. For follow-ups also she is very helpful and understanding.  Also we are impressed by her simplicity and consultation experience was also good. I'm continuing her treatment. I do recommend her.

review: I had consulted Dr.darshini a month ago regarding fever ,cough and cold. She advised me good medicines and that helped me a lot. I recovered smoothly.  Today I visited her for throat infection and she gave suitable medications and advises for the same. She is friendly to me and I'm satisfied with her consultation. I do recommend her.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,
review: Doctor didn't even keep the stethoscope and check if I have any congestion. Even after request to check with stethoscope, she denied. She directly wrote antibiotics and said whatever problem you might have antibiotics will take care. I don't recommend of going to this doctor
reply_text:
I think you didn't listen me properly and if you want to get checked by stethoscope you should visit the doctor who is seeing covid positive cases and touching them. I have my own reasons of not seeing covid positive patients in person still I explained you your condition and asked for each n every symptoms you're having. 
Though you're randomly taking antibiotics on your own that's not bothering you but when doctor writes suitable line of treatment for you who has knowledge and experience , that's bothering you...!! It's strange..!!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Visited Dr.Darshini for severe low Hb level around 6, she was very patient and suggested to get the IV injections by getting hospitalized instead of getting it done at the clinics and that really helped as they could detect my veins easily and gave it at one shot. She is very friendly and easy to connect with as well.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: I consulted Dr.Darshini with issue of tiredness, nunbness and pain in my arms and legs. Doctor was very patient enough with me and listened to my issue and gave very satisfying suggestion and medication. She is very friendly, understands her patients and handles her patients with courtesy.  I would definitely recommend this doctor to all ladies young or old. She can be reached anytime and can be relied 100%.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
review: She is a good and friendly doctor. She listened to my medical history and suggested me the necessary tests and gave the treatment accordingly which suited me. Also she was very supportive and fast responsive over phone for further assistance needed by me.

review: She is an amazing doctor. She listened to all the problems patiently. Then diagnosed the problem.  Explained everything nicely. No unnecessary tests. Only relative tests she prescribed. I told her that I can’t come back to her to show the reports. She gave me her number to connect on WhatsApp and responded to my messages even on Sunday. I am extremely satisfied and would definitely recommend her
reply_text:

Take care of your mother

review:
Dr Darshini diagnosis was spot on.. based on my symptoms explanation, she immediately said it should be dengue and let’s go for dengue’s blood test. And yes, it was dengue indeed. The medication prescribed by Doctor, helped me in smooth recovery. I would definitely recommend Dr Darshini for consultation.

Thank you Mam for your patience and commitment in helping me to tackle this dangerous fever.

I had consulted the doctor regarding my normal health check up. Doctor was very friendly and highly professional. She explained things well and discussed my health problems and suggested appropriate medications. 
Thank you doctor..!!
I would highly recommend her to anyone who is looking to get themselves checked up.

I had consulted the doctor for my mother. She was very friendly and listened to all the problems that my mother had, asked more appropriate questions to understand her condition better! Thanks so much for being so considerate and providing medication support!

tags: Value for money,
review: We went to Apollo Clinic HSR today for my MIL. She is expecting a cataract surgery & had to undergo an ECG & meet with a Physician for that. The ECG was done & we met with Dr. Darshini Mehta. As soon as we entered her chamber, she asked us to close the door & asked for 500 bucks extra. We had already paid the consultation fees & registration charges at the billing desk earlier. Despite that she demanded another 500 bucks to give to her & not at the billing desk. We were stunned by her behavior & my husband had to give 500 bucks without getting any receipt from her.  She then just wrote that the patient is fit for the surgery. Is this how you consult a doctor there?
reply_text:
Your mother in law suffers from various disorders and there are several medications that she is on. So the first thing for you should be to see and understand that. Secondly, during the consultation you were not present inside my chamber, so you don't have any idea how I wrote the fitness evaluation so please don't put such negative thoughts over here. As a good doctor I should not reveal any details regarding the patient and I'm not going to do that.

Regarding fitness - you should see the two pages of recommendation that were written by me after full evaluation of your mother in law with advice that has to be followed by her prior to surgery. Additionally, I also consulted for you mother in law's sleeping issues on your husband's demand (though she was not my patient) and I wrote medication for her.

It's very shameful that you know only half of the story and you're putting feedback like this, that too anonymously. I hope I don't have to deal with patients like you ever again.

review: She listen carefully to under the rootcause of the problem  and and suggests medicine accordingly .......

review: I went to the doctor for a fever/cold. I reached out to her for follow ups over the next few days over call and chat. I would rate her highly for her approachability and responsiveness throughout our interactions.
She is very cooperative and understanding. She will guide you thoroughly and will be there to help you out eveytime.
Doctor is friendly and easy to reach in what's up. She replies fast and caring is good. Thankyou Doctor.

I had consulted the doctor. She was very kind and listen all my problems with patience. She diagnosed my condition very well and asked appropriate questions for that.
I do recommend the doctor

review: I have consulted Dr. Darshini mam as i am feeling palpitations and weakness. Immediately she responded well and suggested relevant tests to rule out. As i visited her on Saturday, she is much concerned about my health and suggested some medication for the holiday even. She is very friendly in treatment and concerned about my health as my family member. I am very much glad visiting her and more over I am very happy with her treatment.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,Value for money,
review: This doctor didn't even touch the patient. Let alone putting on her stethoscope and checking the patient. Sat back and relaxed to suggested Dolo-650. These days even uneducated and uncivilized people know what to take when one has fever. Never seen such a awful general physician ever. Seems like it's a unworthy to spend time and money.
reply_text:
1st you didn't mention your name. 
2nd thing may be you have come with complaint of fever only  and it could be due to many reasons .
3rd thing may be you are having complain of only fever and when we checked it turns out to be normal so I must have told you it could be because of viral nothing else and advised you to take only dolo 650 not the strong painkillers  which can affect your blood counts if you develop dengue further.
4th I told you to come back after 2 to 3 days if you develop any other symptoms. 
Only thing I don't want to push you for so many blood tests and want you to recover with minimum medications.

review: Doctor ma’am investigates in detail , ease your mental pressure by deep understanding of the medical  problems or complaints. she takes care of her patient and revert to their queries proactively and in timely manner . She diagnosed me well and provided right treatment guidance .

** ******** ** * ********* *************. She was very patient with listening to all my symptoms and very accurately analysed my condition. Her prescribed medications helped me recover smoothly. She was also supportive of any follow ups I had. I would like to thank her for her help!
